data.name: Chapel 3-D: The Ascent
data.detailed_description:
ğŸ”¥ WISHLIST TO SURVIVE ğŸ”¥



About the Game



ğŸ–ï¸ Unlimited power at your fingertips! Start off as a feeble weakling of a human being and transform into a terrifying fire-breathing monster by separating your heart from your body. Beware, however, as gaining such power is a cardinal sin and you will have to pay for your transgressions.
ğŸ–ï¸ Set out on a daring, inter-dimensional escape and travel between various different worlds to flee the wrath of your enemies.
ğŸ–ï¸ Use your newfound powers to your advantage; throw your heart around and teleport to it at will. Run, jump and traverse the levels nimble as a cat and feel good doing it thanks to the fluid movement system.



ğŸ”¥ Get on the offensive and use a variety of deadly spells at your disposal in fast-paced, break-neck pace combat. Being a forsaken beast of a man has some perks, after all.
ğŸ”¥ Try not to get distracted as you marvel at the carefully-crafted beautiful locations, all in nostalgic retro-inspired aesthetic.
ğŸ”¥ Finally experience the story behind the events of Cathedral 3-D and become one with the monster on your screen.
ğŸ”¥ Run, jump, fight, dive,
ğŸ”¥ SURVIVE.

data.short_description: ğŸ”¥ Chapel 3-D: The Ascent is a break-neck, violent boomer shooter inspired by classics of the genre. Experience the story behind the events of Cathedral 3-D and make your enemies regret ever crossing your path. Become a beast and let loose. ğŸ”¥
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Ukrainian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Intel Core i7 (4th gen, Haswell)
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000 (or other compatible with OpenGL 3.3)
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectXÂ® 9.0c compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Intel Core i7 (4th gen, Haswell)
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000 (or other compatible with OpenGL 3.3)
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectXÂ® 9.0c compatible
